import React from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { isAuthenticated, signOut } from "../api/userAPI"; const Navbar = () => { let navigate = useNavigate() let { user } = isAuthenticated(); const handleSignOut = () => { signOut() .then(data => { if(data.error) { console.log(data.error) } else { navigate('/signin') } }) } return ( <>
My Store
{ user && (user.role === 1? : <> 99+ unread messages ) } {!user ? ( <> ) : ( )}
Home Products About Services Contact
); }; export default Navbar;
